checkerList.description: Method with Optional return type returns explicit null

checkerList.name: IIO_INEFFICIENT_INDEX_OF
checkerList.description: This code passes a constant string of length 1 to String.indexOf(). It is more efficient to use the integer implementations of String.indexOf(). f. e. call myString.indexOf('.') instead of myString.indexOf(".")

checkerList.name: IIO_INEFFICIENT_LAST_INDEX_OF
checkerList.description: This code passes a constant string of length 1 to String.lastIndexOf(). It is more efficient to use the integer implementations of String.lastIndexOf(). f. e. call myString.lastIndexOf('.') instead of myString.lastIndexOf(".")

checkerList.name: CNT_ROUGH_CONSTANT_VALUE
checkerList.description: It's recommended to use the predefined library constant for code clarity and better precision.

checkerList.name: BSHIFT_WRONG_ADD_PRIORITY
checkerList.description: Possible bad parsing of shift operation

checkerList.name: CO_COMPARETO_INCORRECT_FLOATING
checkerList.description: compareTo()/compare() incorrectly handles float or double value

checkerList.name: DC_PARTIALLY_CONSTRUCTED
checkerList.description: Possible exposure of partially initialized object

checkerList.name: DM_BOXED_PRIMITIVE_FOR_COMPARE
checkerList.description: A boxed primitive is created just to call compareTo method. It's more efficient to use static compare method (for double and float since Java 1.4, for other primitive types since Java 1.7) which works on primitives directly.

checkerList.name: DM_INVALID_MIN_MAX
checkerList.description: Incorrect combination of Math.max and Math.min

checkerList.name: ME_MUTABLE_ENUM_FIELD
checkerList.description: Enum field is public and mutable

checkerList.name: ME_ENUM_FIELD_SETTER
checkerList.description: Public enum method unconditionally sets its field

checkerList.name: MS_MUTABLE_COLLECTION
checkerList.description: Field is a mutable collection

checkerList.name: MS_MUTABLE_COLLECTION_PKGPROTECT
checkerList.description: Field is a mutable collection which should be package protected

checkerList.name: RANGE_ARRAY_INDEX
checkerList.description: Array index is out of bounds

checkerList.name: RANGE_ARRAY_OFFSET
checkerList.description: Array offset is out of bounds

checkerList.name: RANGE_ARRAY_LENGTH
checkerList.description: Array length is out of bounds

checkerList.name: RANGE_STRING_INDEX
checkerList.description: String index is out of bounds

checkerList.name: RV_RETURN_VALUE_IGNORED_NO_SIDE_EFFECT
checkerList.description: Return value of method without side effect is ignored

checkerList.name: UC_USELESS_CONDITION
checkerList.description: Condition has no effect

checkerList.name: UC_USELESS_CONDITION_TYPE
checkerList.description: Condition has no effect due to the variable type

checkerList.name: UC_USELESS_OBJECT
checkerList.description: Useless object created

checkerList.name: UC_USELESS_OBJECT_STACK
checkerList.description: Useless object created on stack

checkerList.name: UC_USELESS_VOID_METHOD
checkerList.description: Useless non-empty void method
